representation_information.name: MPEG-2 File with 422 Video and Layer II Audio Encoding
representation_information.description: File containing an MPEG-2 program stream consisting of 4:2:2 Profile MPEG-2 encoded video multiplexed with MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 Layer II encoded audio. The program stream may also be delivered via a serial interface.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
